description:
Are you new to Confluence? Are you working in Software Development or Testing and not aware how to use Confluence effectively? Do you want to keep yourself competitive in the IT market by leveling up your Confluence skills? Then this course is for you.

This course is the fastest path to level up your Confluence skills.

In this course you will learn about Confluence from very basic till intermediate concepts of Confluence. This course is well thought and designed in a way that will suit the very basic and intermediate Confluence user.

I have started from basic concepts on Confluence and some of the important tips and tricks to get your documentation done quickly in confluence. I have also covered various macros which will help you to prepare well organised and very good looking Confluence pages.

So just go ahead and enroll for the course as you are not going to get anything better with such a competitive price.
title: Learn Confluence in 3 hours
